pages.text: $(li)Rails are blocks that provide a path along which $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/minecart)Minecarts$(/l) can travel.$(br)$(li)They can be found in the $(l:patchouli:structures/mineshaft)Mineshafts$(/l).

$(li)There are exists three different variants of the Rails:$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/activator_rail)Activator Rail$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/detector_rail)Detector Rail$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/powered_rail)Powered Rail$(/l).
